UIDictionary.GameOverVictory: The invasion was stopped and the Outer Wilds are saved!
UIDictionary.GameOverErnesto: You and Mechernesto successfully negotiated a ceasefire.

ShipLogDictionary.RANGER_EGGSTAR_RUMOR: There's an evil-looking artificial planet in this solar system. Some kind of wooden space station is orbiting around it.
ShipLogDictionary.RANGER_EGGSTAR_DISCOVERY: The <![CDATA[<color=red>Egg Star</color>]]> is a battlestation that the Eggmund Empire is using to invade the Outer Wilds. The Solar Rangers want me to destroy it.
ShipLogDictionary.RANGER_EGGSTAR_VICTORY: I successfully destroyed the <![CDATA[<color=red>Egg Star</color>]]> and stopped the invasion.

DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INTRO_1_1: About damn time you showed up, cadet! Abandoning your duty as a Solar Ranger? The invaders will be launching an attack any minute now!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INTRO_1_CHOICE_1: Cadet? You must be mistaken, I'm not--
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INTRO_2_1: What was that, cadet? Are you questioning your superior officer?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INTRO_3_1: Good! Now then, let's get you briefed on the situation.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_RANGERS_1: You hit your head out there, cadet?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_RANGERS_2: The Solar Rangers are the last bastion of freedom and justice in the outer wilds!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_RANGERS_3: Using our superior technology and firepower, we defend settlers and other peaceful folk from the dangers lurking in deep space.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INVADERS_1: That's right! An invasion! The nefarious Eggmund Empire is preparing to conquer this solar system!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INVADERS_2: See that unsightly planetoid beneath us? That's one of their dastardly Egg Star battlestations!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INVADERS_3: The Egg Star has a powerful superlaser capable of blowing up the sun itself, which would kill us all!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INVADERS_4: To keep the community of the outer wilds safe, we must repel these invaders!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_ORDERS_1: Due to... unplanned circumstances, you're our only spaceworthy ranger, so it's all up to you, cadet!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_ORDERS_2: First, you'll need to destroy all of the reinforcement beacons on the outside of the Egg Star.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_ORDERS_3: Some of those beacons will be shielded, so you'll need to use your laserscope or scout-grenade to take them out on foot.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_ORDERS_4: That should force the main hatch to open up, allowing you to make your way into the vulnerable interior and reach the reactor core.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_ORDERS_5: Once you've found it, blow that reactor core sky high and get the hell out of there!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INVASION_2: Sweet mother of stars, they're here!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_INVASION_3: Now get to your ship, cadet! We've just outfitted it with the latest armaments! Go take down those eggheads!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_EXIT_1: Good! Now get to your ship, cadet! That's an order!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_VICTORY_1: Excellent job, cadet! With the Egg Star destroyed, the citizens of our beloved Outer Wilds are safe once more!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_VICTORY_2: Our sun is definitely safe from exploding via superlaser now, so I think we can all rest easy for a while.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_VICTORY_3: And speaking of a well-deserved reward, I think it's time. I'd like to officially offer you a promotion!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_VICTORY_4: Everyone, please give a round of applause for our newest Ranger! Hip hip hooray!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_GENERAL_VICTORY_CHOICE_1: Thank you, sir. It's been an honor.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_NOMAI_ENTRY_2: Don't worry about your ship, we'll get your weaponry fixed up for you!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_NOMAI_ENTRY_3: Let's defend the folks of the Outer Wilds together, okay?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_NOMAI_VICTORY_1: Welcome back, and well done, ranger! Those eggheads won't be coming for us any time soon!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_OWLK_ENTRY_1: The Solar Rangers help out the community, so we do what we can in return.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_OWLK_ENTRY_2: That's why I decided to sign up and become a Ranger myself.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_OWLK_ENTRY_3: You should speak with the General. He's got a plan to deal with this invasion.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_OWLK_VICTORY_1: Thanks to you, our community is safe once more.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_OWLK_VICTORY_2: I look forward to working alongside you, ranger.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_EXPILOT_ENTRY_1: Nice ship, cadet! It's almost as fancy as mine!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_EXPILOT_ENTRY_2: Or, well, it was. Tried to do a barrel roll in zero gravity and you can guess how that went.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_EXPILOT_VICTORY_1: Nice going, ranger! Glad to see you and your ship back in one piece!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_KID_ENTRY_1: Before you ask, yes, I'm plenty old enough to be joining a paramilitary group!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_KID_ENTRY_2: Recruiting the young is a time-honored tactic for good guys fighting evil empires!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_KID_VICTORY_1: Guess I'm not the newest ranger on the team anymore! Well done!
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_MAIN_1: Hey it's me Mechernesto the cybernetically enhanced talking anglerfish.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_MAIN_CHOICE_1: What's with the eye thing? Aren't anglerfish blind?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_MAIN_CHOICE_3: Shouldn't we be... fighting or something?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_CYBERNETICS_2: But it looks pretty cool, right?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_HIDING_1: What are any of us doing here, really?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_HIDING_2: We only exist for a brief 22-minute span out of the trillions of years this universe has existed, and now everything is about to die.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_HIDING_3: Is the universe really cyclical? Is there anything that comes after the end? Does our life here truly have a purpose, or is it just random chance?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_HIDING_4: Does just being here, sharing this brief moment of existence with each other, give us meaning? Is existence itself the source of all fulfillment, however brief?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_HIDING_CHOICE_1: No, I mean, why are you here, on Timber One?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_1: I guess? Kinda feels like that goes against the whole 'spirit of companionship' thing this game has going for it, though.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_2: Actually, this whole invasion feels pretty silly. I'm not even sure what we're supposed to be fighting over.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_3: Me and the Egg Emperor, Third of His Name, Conqueror of Space and Time, Annihilator of the Stars... we go way back, actually. Shared a dorm in college.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_4: How about I give him a quick call and we get this whole thing sorted out?
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_CHOICE_1: Nah, that's fine. I'll just stop the invasion the normal way.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_CHOICE_2: You know what? Sure. Let's do it.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_MISSED_1: Not much point now that the invasion is over. I'm more of a lover than a fighter, anyway.
DialogueDictionary.RANGER_ERNESTO_PEACE_MISSED_2: It's a shame we didn't get a chance to talk earlier, before the fighting started. Maybe we could've avoided this whole thing, somehow.
